Device Description: Compact and versatile environmental sensor module designed for monitoring temperature and humidity in various applications.
Property Description: The measure of the hotness or coldness of the air.
Datastream Description: The datastream containing mesures of field Demo Field by sensor D001 which measures Air Temperature.

Device Description: Compact and versatile environmental sensor module designed for monitoring temperature and humidity in various applications.
Property Description: The amount of moisture or water vapor present in the air, often expressed as a percentage of the maximum amount the air could hold at a given temperature.
Datastream Description: The datastream containing mesures of field Demo Field by sensor D001 which measures Air Humidity.

Device Description: Compact and versatile environmental sensor module designed for monitoring temperature and humidity in various applications.
Property Description: The quantity of carbon dioxide gas present in the air, used to assess air quality and monitor environmental conditions.
Datastream Description: The datastream containing mesures of field Demo Field by sensor D001 which measures CO2 Concentration.

Device Description: A sensor module for measuring soil moisture and temperature, ideal for agriculture and environmental monitoring.
Datastream Description: The datastream containing mesures of field Demo Field by sensor D002 which measures Soil Moisture.

Device Description: A sensor module for measuring soil moisture and temperature, ideal for agriculture and environmental monitoring.
Datastream Description: The datastream containing mesures of field Demo Field by sensor D002 which measures Soil Temperature.
